channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Waste left by unknown person on the grass, 9th January
item.description:
This is an infection control issue because of rats. This has been there for over a month and is causing flies in nearby houses and strong smells also, please can this be removed as soon as possible

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betsham Road, North End, Greater London

item.title: Building/Construction Waste Materials Fly tipped or left in the street. Needs removing, 9th January
item.description:
Building waste left on the street for months. When reported on the 1 Dec 2025, the update was 'too heavy need a hiab'. The problem was marked as fixed this is not the case. Please return with hiab and remove.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Piedmont Road, Plumstead

item.title: Large Amount of fly tipping outside only entrance to 43 Slaithwaite Court, 9th January
item.description:
There is a large amount of fly tipping outside this adress. this is making it increasingly difficult to gain access to the properties drive. Please note this property is a Care home for Vulnerable Adults and so needs access to the drive for not only care workers vehicles but also emergency vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slaithwaite Road, Hither Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside no. 66, 9th January
item.description:
On 20th December the pavement outside number 66, was changed. The paving slabs were replaced with a compacted gravel. The gravel is completely out of character with the rest of the street and not in keeping with the area. If utility works were performed, the utility contractor has not repaired the pavement after their works to an adequate standard to how it was before the work.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Solent Road, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forburg Road, Hackney, London
